Title: Restored Me
Writer: Jon Knitter, Rhyan LaMarr, Joe Turner, Michelle Turner
Actors: Noel Gugliemi, Steven Bauer, Will Yun Lee, Malik Yoba
Plot: A troubled ex-con joins the colorful crew of an old movie theater and begins to rebuild his life, only to find his faith in God tested when he learns the theater he has grown to love is not what it seems.
